bio.name: Olivia
bio.display: function disp() {$('#header').prepend(HTMLbioPic.replace(dataReplaser, obj.biopic)); $('#header').prepend(HTMLheaderRole.replace(dataReplaser, obj.role));$('#header').prepend(HTMLheaderName.replace(dataReplaser, obj.name));$('#header').append(HTMLwelcomeMsg.replace(dataReplaser, obj.welcomeMessage));$('#header').append(HTMLskillsStart.replace(dataReplaser, obj.skillsstart));for (let i = 0; i < obj.skills.length; i++) {$('#skills').prepend(HTMLskills.replace(dataReplaser, obj.skills[i]));}let email = HTMLemail.replace(dataReplaser, obj.contacts.email);let mobile = HTMLmobile.replace(dataReplaser, obj.contacts.mobile);let github = HTMLgithub.replace(dataReplaser, obj.contacts.github);let location_home = HTMLlocation.replace(dataReplaser, obj.contacts.location);let contactsArray = [email, mobile, github, location_home];for (let i = 0; i < contactsArray.length; i++) {$('#topContacts').append(contactsArray[i]);$('#footerContacts').append(contactsArray[i]);}}

education.display: function disp() {$('#education').append(HTMLschoolStart);for (let i = 0; i < obj.schools.length; i++) {$('.education-entry').append(HTMLschoolName.replace(dataReplaser, obj.schools[i].name) + HTMLschoolDegree.replace(dataReplaser, obj.schools[i].degree), HTMLschoolDates.replace(dataReplaser, obj.schools[i].dates), HTMLschoolLocation.replace(dataReplaser, obj.schools[i].location), HTMLschoolMajor.replace(dataReplaser, obj.schools[i].majors));}$('.education-entry').append(HTMLonlineClasses);for (let i = 0; i < obj.onlineCourses.length; i++) {$('.education-entry').append(HTMLonlineTitle.replace(dataReplaser, obj.onlineCourses[i].title) + HTMLonlineSchool.replace(dataReplaser, obj.onlineCourses[i].school), HTMLonlineDates.replace(dataReplaser, obj.onlineCourses[i].dates), HTMLonlineURL.replace(dataReplaser, obj.onlineCourses[i].url).replace('#', obj.onlineCourses[i].url));}}

projects.display: function disp() {$('#projects').append(HTMLprojectStart);for (let i = 0; i < obj.projects.length; i++) {$('.project-entry').append(HTMLprojectTitle.replace(dataReplaser, obj.projects[i].title));$('.project-entry').append(HTMLprojectDates.replace(dataReplaser, obj.projects[i].dates));$('.project-entry').append(HTMLprojectDescription.replace(dataReplaser, obj.projects[i].description));for (let j = 0; j < obj.projects[i].images.length; j++) {$('.project-entry').append(HTMLprojectImage.replace(dataReplaser, obj.projects[i].images[j]));}}}

work.display: function disp() {$('#workExperience').append(HTMLworkStart);for (let i = 0; i < obj.jobs.length; i++) {let mywork = HTMLworkEmployer.replace(dataReplaser, obj.jobs[i].employer) + HTMLworkTitle.replace(dataReplaser, obj.jobs[i].title);$('.work-entry').append(mywork);$('.work-entry').append(HTMLworkDates.replace(dataReplaser, obj.jobs[i].dates));$('.work-entry').append(HTMLworkLocation.replace(dataReplaser, obj.jobs[i].location));$('.work-entry').append(HTMLworkDescription.replace(dataReplaser, obj.jobs[i].description));}}
